sections.title: Ect2

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: R1 pertains to the use of diagrams, which is not applicable in the context of the provided text-only content.
R2 is related to suggesting expansions to standardized formatting for diagrams. Since there are no diagrams in this section, this requirement is not applicable.

sections.meta_notes: This section focuses on textual content about the interaction of Ect2 and anillin. Diagram-related requirements do not apply, so they were evaluated as not applicable.
